videoinput.label: Camera
videoinput.placeholder: Enable camera to see the preview

leaveRoomPrompt: This will make you leave the meeting.

shareDialog.heading: Your meeting is ready
shareDialog.description: Share this link with people you want to invite to the meeting.
shareDialog.permissions: People with this link do not need your permission to join this meeting.

createRoom.heading: Authentication Required
createRoom.body: This room has not been created yet. Please authenticate to create it or wait for an authenticated user to do so.

effects.activateCamera: Your camera is disabled. Choose an option to enable it.
effects.notAvailable: The blur effect will be available soon on your browser. We're working on it! In the meantime, you can use Google Chrome for best performance or Firefox :(
effects.heading: Blur
effects.experimental: Experimental feature. A v2 is coming for full browser support and improved quality.

chat.disclaimer: The messages are visible to participants only at the time they are sent. All messages are deleted at the end of the call.

start.heading: Start the Assistant!
start.body: The assistant automatically starts recording your meeting audio (limited to 1 hour). At the end, you'll receive a clear and concise summary of the discussion directly via email.

stop.heading: Recording in Progress...
stop.body: Your meeting is currently being recorded. You will receive a summary via email once the meeting ends.

rating.question: What do you think about the quality of your call?

openFeedback.question: What can we do to improve Visio?
openFeedback.placeholder: Describe your bugs or share your suggestionsâ€¦

confirmationMessage.heading: Thank you for your submission
confirmationMessage.body: Our product team takes the time to carefully review your feedback. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

muteParticipantAlert.description: Mute {{name}} for all participants? {{name}} will be the only one who can unmute themselves.
